categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male Human Jedi Padawan lived at some point during the Galactic Civil War, honoring customs and traditions of the purged Jedi Order. He wore a robe traditional for the Jedi apparel and was on at least one occasion practicing with the training remote.
This character was depicted on the "Jedi Padawan" card of the Champions of the Force, the base set of the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game, which was illustrated by artist Monte Moore.
